txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Stitch fur blankets for the people of Wildermore ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A skilled tailor such as yourself can help the refugees of Wildermore by stitching warm blankets for them.

'Are you a tailor as well as a hero, [placeholder]? That is good to hear, for many refugees in Forlaw shiver in this colder climate. It will take them a while to adjust; until then, they need blankets.\n\n'Have you any Riddermark hides that can be turned into warm blankets for the people?'
Hildelith has given you a recipe for fur blankets.\n\nYou should stitch fur blankets for the cold refugees at Forlaw.

'These are lovely, [placeholder]! I aspire to do such skilled tailoring myself, but I am afraid I am nowhere near your level of skill.\n\n'I will make sure that these are delivered to those who need them.'
Deliver the fur blankets to Hildelith
Hildelith is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have stitched fur blankets, and should now deliver them to Hildelith.
